column1: #text=The last time that I flew in an airplane I bought a ticket to New Orleans .
#text=I bought the ticket early to make sure it was as cheap as possible .
#text=Then I started packing my bags to make sure I had everything that I needed for my trip .
#text=I also planned to figure out how I was going to arrive at the airport .
#text=On the day of the flight , once I arrived at the airport , I checked one of my bags and proceeded to the TSA terminal .
#text=At the TSA the check your ID and make sure you do n't bring anything that is not allowed on the plane .
#text=I was not bringing anything that was not allowed so I got in with no problems .
#text=After that I found my gate , waited a bit and boarded the plane .
#text=On the plane I looked out of the window and took some naps .
